CVorticon.cpp

00001 #include "CObjectAI.h"
00002 #include "misc.h"
00003 #include "sdl/sound/CSound.h"
00004 #include "graphics/CGfxEngine.h"
00005 #include "graphics/effects/CFlash.h"
00006 #include "CVorticon.h"

00008 // Vorticon (all Episodes, albeit the behavior changes slightly
00009 // depending on levelcontrol.Episode).
00010 CVorticon::CVorticon(CMap *p_map, std::vector<CPlayer> &m_vec_Player, Uint32 x,
00011   Uint32 y, char hp, object_t objtype) :
00012  CObject(p_map, x, y, objtype), m_Difficulty(mp_Map->m_Difficulty), m_Dark(
00013    mp_Map->m_Dark), m_Player(m_vec_Player)
00014 {
00015  frame = 0;
00016  animtimer = 0;
00017  state = VORT_LOOK;
00018  timer = 0;
00019  dist_traveled = VORT_TRAPPED_DIST + 1;
00020  HealthPoints = hp;
00021  canbezapped = true;
00022 
00023  short Episode = g_pBehaviorEngine->getEpisode();
00024  // copy in animation frame indexes for the current ep
00025  if (Episode == 1) {
00026   WalkLeftFrame = VORT1_WALK_LEFT_FRAME;
00027   WalkRightFrame = VORT1_WALK_RIGHT_FRAME;
00028   LookFrame = VORT1_LOOK_FRAME;
00029   JumpRightFrame = VORT1_JUMP_RIGHT_FRAME;
00030   JumpLeftFrame = VORT1_JUMP_LEFT_FRAME;
00031   DyingFrame = VORT1_DYING_FRAME;
00032  } else if (Episode == 2) {
00033   WalkLeftFrame = VORT2_WALK_LEFT_FRAME;
00034   WalkRightFrame = VORT2_WALK_RIGHT_FRAME;
00035   LookFrame = VORT2_LOOK_FRAME;
00036   JumpRightFrame = VORT2_JUMP_RIGHT_FRAME;
00037   JumpLeftFrame = VORT2_JUMP_LEFT_FRAME;
00038   DyingFrame = VORT2_DYING_FRAME;
00039   DeadFrame = VORT2_DEAD_FRAME;
00040  } else if (Episode == 3) {
00041   WalkLeftFrame = VORT3_WALK_LEFT_FRAME;
00042   WalkRightFrame = VORT3_WALK_RIGHT_FRAME;
00043   LookFrame = VORT3_LOOK_FRAME;
00044   JumpRightFrame = VORT3_JUMP_RIGHT_FRAME;
00045   JumpLeftFrame = VORT3_JUMP_LEFT_FRAME;
00046   DyingFrame = VORT3_DYING_FRAME;
00047   DeadFrame = VORT3_DEAD_FRAME;
00048  }
00049 }
00050 
00051 void CVorticon::process() {
00052  bool kill = false;
00053  short Episode = g_pBehaviorEngine->getEpisode();
00054 
00055  if (HealthPoints <= 0 && state != VORT_DYING && state != VORT2_DYING)
00056   kill = true;
00057  else if (Episode == 2 && mp_Map->at((getXLeftPos()) >> CSF, (getYUpPos())
00058    >> CSF) == TILE_GLOWCELL)
00059   kill = true;
00060 
00061  if (kill) {
00062   animtimer = 0;
00063   frame = 0;
00064   if (Episode == 1) {
00065    // White Fade and back
00066    if(m_Player[0].mp_option[OPT_FLASHEFFECT].value)
00067     g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(new CFlash(3000, 8, 0xFFFFFF, 200));
00068    state = VORT_DYING;
00069    dying = true;
00070   } else {
00071    state = VORT2_DYING;
00072    dying = true;
00073   }
00074 
00075   g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_VORT_DIE, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00076  }
00077 
00078  vort_reprocess: ;
00079  switch (state) {
00080  case VORT_JUMP:
00081   if (movedir == RIGHT && !blockedr)
00082    xinertia = VORT_WALK_SPEED;
00083   else if (!blockedl)
00084    xinertia = -VORT_WALK_SPEED;
00085 
00086   if (yinertia == 0 && blockedd) { // The Vorticon Has landed after the jump!
00087    state = VORT_LOOK;
00088    goto vort_reprocess;
00089   }
00090 
00091   break;
00092  case VORT_LOOK:
00093   sprite = LookFrame + frame;
00094 
00095   if (animtimer > VORT_LOOK_ANIM_TIME) {
00096    if (frame > 0) {
00097     if (blockedl) {
00098      movedir = RIGHT;
00099     } else if (blockedr) {
00100      movedir = LEFT;
00101     } else { // not blocked on either side, head towards player
00102      if (m_Player[0].getXPosition() < getXPosition()) {
00103       movedir = LEFT;
00104      } else {
00105       movedir = RIGHT;
00106      }
00107     }
00108     timer = 0;
00109     frame = 0;
00110     state = VORT_WALK;
00111    } else
00112     frame++;
00113    animtimer = 0;
00114   } else
00115    animtimer++;
00116   break;
00117  case VORT_WALK:
00118   dist_traveled++;
00119   int odds;
00120 
00121   switch (m_Difficulty) {
00122   case 0:
00123    odds = getProbability(VORT_JUMP_PROB_EASY);
00124    break;
00125   case 2:
00126    odds = getProbability(VORT_JUMP_PROB_HARD);
00127    break;
00128   default:
00129    odds = getProbability(VORT_JUMP_PROB);
00130    break;
00131   }
00132 
00133   if (odds) { // let's jump.
00134    if (!m_Dark && !blockedu) {
00135     initiateJump();
00136     goto vort_reprocess;
00137    }
00138   }
00139   if (movedir == LEFT) { // move left
00140    sprite = WalkLeftFrame + frame;
00141 
00142    if (!blockedl)
00143     xinertia = -VORT_WALK_SPEED;
00144    else
00145    {
00146     frame = 0;
00147     animtimer = 0;
00148     state = VORT_LOOK;
00149 
00150     // if we only traveled a tiny amount before hitting a wall, we've
00151     // probably fallen into a small narrow area, and we need to try
00152     // to jump out of it
00153     if (dist_traveled < VORT_TRAPPED_DIST && !m_Dark && blockedd
00154       && !blockedu) {
00155      initiateJump();
00156      if (rnd() & 1) {
00157       yinertia = -VORT_MAX_JUMP_HEIGHT;
00158      } else {
00159       yinertia = -VORT_MIN_JUMP_HEIGHT;
00160      }
00161      goto vort_reprocess;
00162     } else
00163      dist_traveled = 0;
00164    }
00165   } else { // move right
00166    sprite = WalkRightFrame + frame;
00167 
00168    if (!blockedr)
00169     xinertia = VORT_WALK_SPEED;
00170    else
00171    {
00172     frame = 0;
00173     animtimer = 0;
00174     state = VORT_LOOK;
00175 
00176     if (dist_traveled < VORT_TRAPPED_DIST && !m_Dark && blockedd
00177       && !blockedu) {
00178      initiateJump();
00179      if (rnd() & 1) {
00180       yinertia = -VORT_MAX_JUMP_HEIGHT;
00181      } else {
00182       yinertia = -VORT_MIN_JUMP_HEIGHT;
00183      }
00184      goto vort_reprocess;
00185     } else
00186      dist_traveled = 0;
00187    }
00188   }
00189   // walk animation
00190   if (animtimer > VORT_WALK_ANIM_TIME) {
00191    if (frame >= 3)
00192     frame = 0;
00193    else
00194     frame++;
00195    animtimer = 0;
00196   } else
00197    animtimer++;
00198   break;
00199  case VORT_DYING:
00200   sprite = DyingFrame + frame;
00201 
00202   if (animtimer > VORT_DIE_ANIM_TIME) {
00203    frame++;
00204    if (frame >= 6) {
00205     frame = 5;
00206     g_pGfxEngine->Palette.fadeto(0, FADE_SPEED_VERY_SLOW);
00207     if (!g_pGfxEngine->Palette.in_progress())
00208      dead = true;
00209    }
00210 
00211    animtimer = 0;
00212   } else
00213    animtimer++;
00214   break;
00215  case VORT2_DYING:
00216   sprite = DyingFrame;
00217   if (animtimer > VORT2_DIE_ANIM_TIME) {
00218    sprite = DeadFrame;
00219    dead = true;
00220   } else {
00221    animtimer++;
00222   }
00223   break;
00224  default:
00225   break;
00226  }
00227 }
00228 
00229 void CVorticon::initiateJump() {
00230  // must be standing on floor to jump
00231  if (!blockedd)
00232   return;
00233 
00234  frame = 0;
00235  animtimer = 0;
00236  yinertia = -((rnd() % (VORT_MAX_JUMP_HEIGHT - VORT_MIN_JUMP_HEIGHT))
00237    + VORT_MIN_JUMP_HEIGHT);
00238 
00239  if (movedir == RIGHT)
00240   sprite = JumpRightFrame;
00241  else
00242   sprite = JumpLeftFrame;
00243 
00244  state = VORT_JUMP;
00245 }
00246 
00247 void CVorticon::getTouchedBy(CObject &theObject) {
00248  if (theObject.m_type == OBJ_PLAYER) {
00249   if (state != VORT_DYING and !dead and state != VORT2_DYING)
00250    theObject.kill();
00251  }
00252 }
